name: Bright Memory Collection
description:
The Bright Memory Collection includes both Bright Memory and Bright Memory: Infinite.

Bright Memory is a lightning-fast fusion of the FPS and action genres, created by FYQD-Studio. Combine a wide variety of skills and abilities to unleash dazzling combo attacks. The journey of Supernatural Science Research Organization (SRO) operative Shelia begins.


Bright Memory: Infinite was released in 2021 and is the latest title from FYQD Studio.
In the year 2036, a strange phenomenon has occurred in the skies around the world. The SRO has sent agents out to various regions to investigate this phenomenon.
